scanning-storage.zh: 请稍后，正在计算使用空间....

storage-usage-header.zh: Construct 已使用了[b]{0}[/b]，大约占据您本地浏览器存储配额{1}的{2}％空间。 清理下方缓存数据可能有助于释放更多空间使用。
storage-usage-header.en: Construct is using an estimated [b]{0}[/b] local storage out of a {1} quota ({2}%) on this device. Clearing the storage items below may help free up more space for Construct to use.

export-manager.label.zh: [b]清理 {0} 项已导出的项目文件[/b] ({1})

export-manager.tip.zh: [i]最近导出的项目都会保存在导出管理器中。需要时可以再次导出项目，将它们添加回导出管理器。[/i]
export-manager.tip.en: [i]The last few exports are saved in the Export Manager. The projects can be exported again to add them back to the Export Manager.[/i]

more-options.description.zh: 您也可以尝试以下方案，可能会释放出一些可用空间。 但是，这些必须手动完成。
more-options.description.en: You can also try the following options, which may also increase the available quota. However these must be done manually.

more-options.local-browser-saves.zh: 目前正在使用本地浏览器保存。删除任何您不再需要的旧项目或将它们移到其他路径，都可以释放出更多使用空间。
more-options.local-browser-saves.en: Local browser saves have been used. Deleting any old projects you no longer need, or moving them somewhere else, will free up space.

more-options.system-storage-cleanup.zh: 如果您的设备上有其他可用的系统文件清理工具，请使用它。
more-options.system-storage-cleanup.en: Use a system storage cleanup utility, if one is available on your device.

nothing-to-clear.zh: 您还没有选中要清理的项目，选中您希望清理的项目旁边的单选框。
nothing-to-clear.en: There is nothing set to be cleared. Check the boxes by the items you wish you clear.

successfully-cleared.zh: 本地储存空间已清理完成(大约释放了{0})。需注意，如果短期内再次对存储使用情况进行评估，空间数据可能不会立即被更新。
successfully-cleared.en: Successfully cleared storage (about {0} saved). Note the storage usage estimate may not update immediately.

error-clearing.zh: 清除本地存储时发生错误，重新加载Construct然后再次尝试。
error-clearing.en: An error occurred while clearing storage. Try reloading Construct and clearing storage again.

example-projects.tip.zh: [i]这些是在起始页的案例库下载的示例项目，保存以供离线使用。当你下次需要时，可以再重新下载。[/i]
example-projects.tip.en: [i]Example projects opened from the Example Browser are saved for use offline. The projects can be downloaded again while online.[/i]

c3-offline.tip.zh: [i]保留了最近几个 Construct 版本以便离线使用。他们都可以删除，但下次打开Construct 时必须联网状态使用。[/i]
c3-offline.tip.en: [i]The last few versions of Construct are saved for use offline. These can be deleted, but you must be online next time you load Construct.[/i]

more-options.private-browsing.zh: 如果您正在以无痕模式访问，请尝试切换回正常浏览模式。因为无痕模式可能会限制网站对本地存储空间的使用权限。
more-options.private-browsing.en: Private browsing modes sometimes have much lower storage limits. If you are using a private browsing mode, try switching back to the normal browsing mode.

linux-cef.label.zh: [b]删除 {0} 个已下载的 Linux CEF 版本[/b] ({1})

linux-cef.tip.zh: [i]Linux CEF 版本可在联网时再次下载。[/i]
linux-cef.tip.en: [i]Linux CEF versions can be downloaded again while online.[/i]

description_en: The Storage Cleanup dialog is a tool that helps you to free up storage space on the local device. If you run out of available storage space, it can cause errors to appear and may stop some features of Construct working correctly. This tool provides a way to help solve the problem if that happens. In some cases Construct will recommend you use this dialog to free up more space if it detects a storage problem that may have been caused by lack of free space. The Storage Cleanup dialog can be opened
